properties.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County/Monument Ridge/Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 6 at 3:36PM MST until February 7 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow, possibly heavy at times, expected. Total snow
accumulations of 2 to 5 inches.

* WHERE...Northern El Paso County.

* WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 8 PM MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered roads with slippery conditions,
as well as significantly reduced visibility. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening and Friday morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Narrow bands of intense snowfall may cause
rapidly deteriorating travel conditions over short distances.
Locally higher snowfall amounts will be possible if these
snow bands remain anchored over the same location.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST FRIDAY
